snippet: A childhood love for television propelled a reporter on the road to a critic’s job.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley describes how her childhood love for watching television inspired her future career as a television critic.
lead_paragraph: A childhood love for television propelled a reporter on the road to a critic’s job.

headline.seo: A Young TV Lover Grows Up to Be a TV Critic
headline.main: A Passion Born in Stolen Glimpses
headline.print_headline: A Passion Born in Stolen Glimpses
